skillTree.name: Barded Nightmare
skillTree.description: The most impressive Nightmares are those reared on fresh blood. Such noble monstrosities are worthy mounts.

effects.description: Mount: Barded Nightmare

skillTree.name: Manticore
skillTree.description: The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.

effects.description: Mount: Manticore

skillTree.name: Lord of the Scourge
skillTree.description: "And I'll lead you all in the dance," said he - the relentless dance of the tireless Undead hordes.

skillTree.name: Thrall Master
skillTree.description: "Come to my side, my Undead servants. Now, you are bound, irrevocably, to my will forever!"

skillTree.name: Grave Ward
skillTree.description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.name: Dark Pact
skillTree.description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when attacking
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Doom Lord of the Undead
skillTree.description: Dieter Helsnicht has an iron will and can bend even the most powerful creatures to his authority.

effects.description: Ability: "Doom Lord of the Undead"

skillTree.name: Twisted Intelligence
skillTree.description: Dieter is a man of deep, if twisted, intelligence and has prepared for every eventuality. He has built a secret fortress deep in the Forest of Shadows to which he could escape should should the need arise.

effects.description:
Armies replenish in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

Ambush success chance: +20%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beasts of the Doom Lord
skillTree.description: The Sight of Dieter riding atop the back of a monstrous manticore is not uncommon. Who knows what other monsters he has managed to bound to his will..

effects.description: Increased chance monsters will be added to the Monster Pens while raiding, fighting battles, or occupying settlements

Weapon strength: +15% for all units recruited from the Monster Pen
	(all armies factionwide)

Melee attack: +6 for all units recruited from the Monster Pen
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Revenge Served Cold
skillTree.description: From his dark and evil hiding place Helsnicht has prepared his evil plans to bring death to the Empire for decades. Those who had previously known Dieter Helsnicht in the Empire have either died or forgotten him.

effects.description: Income from post-battle loot: +30% when fighting against Men

Melee attack: +6 when fighting against Men
	(Lord's army)

Vampiric corruption: +3
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Secrets of Nagashizzar
skillTree.description: Dieter, drawn by an irresistible curiosity, travelled to the fortress of Nagashizzar as a young man. What happened to him in that cursed place is not known, but he returned to Middenheim a changed man, his hair turned prematurely grey and his skin tinged with an unhealthy pallor. The Doomlord had been born!

effects.description: Attribute: Mastery of the Elemental Winds

Attribute: Mastery of the Elemental Winds for Necromancer Heroes
	(Lord's army)
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

skillTree.name: Swooping Doom
skillTree.description: From his secret fortress hidden deep in the Forest of Shadows the Doom Lord remains a threat to the Empire's security. Shambling corpses and terrifying Wraiths are often seen wondering their abyssal forests, and tales persist that the Doom will approach them eventually.

skillTree.description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: The Curse of Anraheir
skillTree.description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

backgroundSkills.name: The Doom Lord of Middenheim
backgroundSkills.description: Dieter Helsnicht, known as the Doom Lord of Middenheim or Doom Lord of the Undead. He built a secret fortress in the Forest of Shadows and concealed it so well that it was never discovered by the Witch Hunters who searched for him for years. There he slowly built up his strength and plotted his revenge.
